SELECT a.shop_id, d.shop_name, d.shop_logo, a.product_id, a.product_name, c.product_image AS image, b.sku_id, b.original_price, b.price, 0 AS activityType, IFNULL(f.number, 0) + a.fictitious_number AS number FROM cere_shop_product a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.product_id, ANY_VALUE(a.price) AS price, ANY_VALUE(a.sku_id) AS sku_id, ANY_VALUE(a.original_price) AS original_price FROM cere_product_sku a JOIN cere_shop_product b ON a.product_id = b.product_id GROUP BY a.product_id ) b ON a.product_id = b.product_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.product_id, ANY_VALUE(a.product_image) AS product_image FROM cere_product_image a JOIN cere_shop_product b ON a.product_id = b.product_id GROUP BY a.product_id ) c ON a.product_id = c.product_id LEFT JOIN cere_platform_shop d ON a.shop_id = d.shop_id LEFT JOIN cere_product_classify e ON a.classify_id = e.classify_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(number) AS number, sku_id FROM cere_order_product GROUP BY sku_id ) f ON b.sku_id = f.sku_id WHERE a.shelve_state = 1 AND d.state = 1

SELECT a.shop_id, a.product_id, a.product_name, b.sku_id, b.original_price, b.price, 0 as activityType, ifnull(f.number, 0) + a.fictitious_number as number from cere_shop_product a LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.product_id,a.price,a.sku_id,a.original_price from cere_product_sku a,cere_shop_product b where a.product_id=b.product_id GROUP BY a.product_id) b ON a.product_id=b.product_id LEFT JOIN cere_product_classify e ON a.classify_id=e.classify_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(number) number,sku_id,order_id from cere_order_product GROUP BY sku_id) f ON b.sku_id=f.sku_id where a.shelve_state=1
